news.title: The shutdown meant no jobs report. Carlyle's analysis shows it would have been pretty bad
news.summary: Job growth of just 17,000 from the month, which would be even less than the 22,000 gain in August. The firm said its proprietary data showed job growth of 17,00 in September.

news.title: The price of gold reached $4,000 an ounce for the first time ever
news.summary: No description available. No description available for this model. For more information on this model, please visit: www.cruiseworld.com/cruisemodel.

news.title: WTO hikes global trade forecast for 2025 — but next year doesn't look so good
news.summary: Global trade volumes rose sharply in the first half of 2025. Businesses front-loaded imports ahead of higher tariffs, says the World Trade Organisation.

news.title: Trilogy Metals shares soar over 250% in premarket after U.S. takes stake in minerals explorer
news.summary: The stock was seen trading up 248% in premarket deals at 1:09 p.m. London time (8:09 a.M. ET)

news.title: NYSE-owner Intercontinental Exchange rises after it takes $2 billion stake in Polymarket
news.summary: Intercontinental Exchange rose more than 3% in the premarket. The company announced it took a $2 billion stake in prediction markets platform Polymarket.

news.title: NYSE owner dives into prediction markets with $2 billion Polymarket investment
news.summary: Intercontinental Exchange to invest up to $2 billion in Polymarket. Polymarket is a prediction-market company founded by Shayne Coplan.

news.title: Carlyle, Bank of America use their own data to say U.S. jobs growth has slowed to trickle
news.summary: Carlyle’s estimate comes in the middle of other numbers being released in an attempt to fill a gap left due to the government shutdown.

news.title: Billionaire Ken Griffin warns on gold’s rally as Goldman targets nearly $5,000
news.summary: Goldman Sachs is now forecasting gold to reach nearly $5,000 next year. One billionaire investor says the precious metal’s rally is a sign of trouble for U.S. assets.

news.title: IBM gets in on the AI-deal action with Anthropic partnership, and its stock is rising
news.summary: The partnership integrates Anthropic’s Claude into enterprise products and development tools to drive productivity gains. The partnership is a collaboration between Anthropic and IBM.

news.title: Gold’s rallying on borrowed time. That could mean contrarians get the last laugh.
news.summary: The metal can’t rise forever in the face of all this exuberance. The metal can't rise forever. The Metal can�’s rise forever is over. It’ll be over soon.
